page.title: 19FARMING ROUND MONIFIETH
page.content: John's mum bought rape cooking oil at the Supermarket.In May-June farmers' fields glow with yellowness of oilseed rape.Once thought to be a weed,farmers grow it as a crop which is subsdised by the EEC. Each farm has its own water supply. Water storage tanks with pipes and sprinklers irrigate the fields in dry seasons.Other crops grown are grass for grazing and silage,wheat,barley, potatoes and peas for canning. {Ardownie}and{Ethiebeaton}feed cattle for market.Sheep,lambs,horse,pigs,cows are kept.The{Laws}keep poultry. { Balhungie}has 100 head dairy cattle to be milked twice daily and is trying 6 acres flax this season.Acreage used_ 50 acre potatoes,40 acre canning peas, and winter wheat and barley.Cattle are bred.They have a Charolais Bull.Mixed woodland forms shelter for all farms.
